EmailTemplate.name: Telematics Confirmation E Mail
EmailTemplate.subject: WEX Telematics Call Confrimation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in the WEX Telematics System. The WEX Telematic’s Specialist will call you on DATE at 9:00 AM/1:00PM EST to go over the WEX Telematic’s unique features, attractive cost savings and our new promotion. If you should have any questions before this meeting, you can contact Kristine Martinez and she can help you. She can be reached at 207-523-6641 or by emailing her at Kristine.martinez@wexinc.com.
It was a pleasure talking to you.
Sincerely,
Brian Fitzpatrick
WEX Telematics Service
